00037 /**
00038  * \file windowVars.c
00039  * \brief window averages the seq vars on a dataset
00040  *
00041  * $Source: /usr/local/Repositories/fcdmf/fclib/tools/windowVars.c,v $
00042  * $Revision: 1.12 $
00043  * $Date: 2006/09/28 06:34:39 $
00044  *
00045  * \description
00046  *    Usage: windowVars [options] dataset [var_name]
00047  *
00048  *    Reports windowaverages. If a variable name is given, it reports
00049  *    the averages for only that variable, otherwise it reports averages for
00050  *    all variables.
00051  *
00052  *    Code modeled on varStats.
00053  *
00054  *
00055  * \modifications
00056  *   - 12/21/04 ACG, created.
00057  *   -  1/14/05 ACG, cleaned out testing stuff since now in checktimeseries.c
00058  */
00059 
00060 #include <string.h>
00061 #include "fc.h"
00062 
00063 #define INDENT_STR "    "
00064 
00065 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00066   FC_ReturnCode rc;
00067   int i, j,ii,jj,k;
00068   int numMesh, numSeqVar, *numStepPerVar;
00069   FC_Dataset ds;
00070   FC_Mesh *meshes;
00071   FC_Variable **seqVars, *newseqvar;
00072   void* data;
00073   void* data2;
00074   char* file_name = NULL;
00075   char* mesh_name;
00076   char* var_name = NULL;
00077   FC_VerbosityLevel verbose_level = FC_QUIET;
00078   int doOnlyOne = 0; // flag for whether to do one (1) or all (0);
00079   char message[1024]; // FIX? fixed buffer size
00080   int window;
00081 
00082   // handle arguments
00083   if (argc < 3 || argc > 6) {
00084   usage:
00085     printf("usage: %s [options] dataset window_size [var_name] n", 
00086            argv[0]);
00087     printf("options: \n");
00088     printf("   -h         : print this help message\n");
00089     printf("   -v         : verbose: print warning and error messages\n");
00090     printf("   -V         : very verbose: prints log and error messages\n");
00091     printf("\n");
00092     printf("Prints window averages of the seq variables in the dataset. If a\n");
00093     printf("variable name is provided, prints only averages for that "
00094            "variable.\n");
00095     fflush(NULL);
00096     exit(-1);
00097   }
00098   for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00099     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-v")) {
00100       verbose_level = FC_WARNING_MESSAGES;
00101     }
00102     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "-V")) {
00103       verbose_level = FC_LOG_MESSAGES;
00104     }
00105     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) || !strncmp(argv[i], "-", 1))
00106       goto usage;
00107     else {
00108       if (i+1 < argc){
00109         file_name = argv[i];
00110         window = atoi(argv[i+1]);
00111         i+=2;
00112       }
00113       if (i < argc) {
00114         doOnlyOne = 1;
00115         var_name = argv[i];
00116       }
00117     }
00118   }
00119   if (!file_name)
00120     goto usage;
00121     
00122   
00123   // init library and load dataset 
00124   rc = fc_setLibraryVerbosity(verbose_level);
00125   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00126   rc = fc_initLibrary();
00127   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00128   rc = fc_loadDataset(file_name, &ds);
00129   fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Failed to load dataset '%s'", file_name);
00130 
00131   // Get number of meshes and mesh names
00132   rc = fc_getMeshes(ds, &numMesh, &meshes);
00133   fc_exitIfError(rc);
00134 
00135   // header
00136   printf("Variable statistics summary for dataset '%s'\n", file_name);
00137   fflush(NULL);
00138   if (numMesh < 0) {
00139     printf("No meshes were found\n");
00140     fflush(NULL);
00141     exit(0);
00142   }
00143   else {
00144     printf("%d meshes\n", numMesh);
00145     fflush(NULL);
00146   }
00147 
00148   // loop over meshes
00149   for (i = 0; i < numMesh; i++) {
00150     fc_getMeshName(meshes[i], &mesh_name);
00151 
00152     if (doOnlyOne){ // get var names
00153       numSeqVar = 1;
00154       numStepPerVar = malloc(sizeof(int));
00155       seqVars = malloc(sizeof(FC_Variable*));
00156 
00157       rc = fc_getOrGenerateUniqueSeqVariableByName(meshes[i],
00158                                  var_name,
00159                                  &numStepPerVar[0],
00160                                  &seqVars[0]);
00161       fc_exitIfErrorPrintf(rc, "Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00162                   var_name);
00163       if (!seqVars[0]){
00164      fc_printfWarningMessage("Problems finding unique variable '%s'",
00165                     var_name);
00166      numSeqVar = 0;
00167         numStepPerVar = 0;
00168         printf("No seq variable %s on mesh %s\n",var_name,mesh_name);
00169         fflush(NULL);
00170       }
00171     }else {
00172       rc = fc_getSeqVariables(meshes[i], &numSeqVar,
00173                               &numStepPerVar,&seqVars);
00174       fc_exitIfError(rc);
00175       if (numSeqVar ==0){
00176         printf("No seq variables on mesh %s\n",mesh_name);
00177         fflush(NULL);
00178       }
00179     }
00180 
00181     for (jj = 0; jj < numSeqVar; jj++) {
00182       // print var info
00183       int numDataPoint, numComponent;
00184       FC_AssociationType assoc, newassoc;
00185       FC_MathType mathtype, newmathtype;
00186       FC_DataType datatype, newdatatype;
00187       int newnumDataPoint, newnumComponent;
00188 
00189       printf("\n");
00190       fflush(NULL);
00191       sprintf(message, "SeqVar %d (on Mesh %d: '%s')", jj, i, mesh_name);
00192       fc_printVariable(seqVars[jj][0], message, 0);
00193 
00194       rc = fc_getVariableInfo(seqVars[jj][0], &numDataPoint, &numComponent,
00195                               &assoc, &mathtype, &datatype);
00196 
00197       rc = fc_leadingWindowAverage(numStepPerVar[jj],seqVars[jj],
00198                                    window,"window",&newseqvar);
00199 
00200       if (rc != FC_SUCCESS){
00201         fc_printfErrorMessage("failed to compute leading window average");
00202         exit(-1);
00203       }
00204 
00205       rc = fc_getVariableInfo(newseqvar[0], &newnumDataPoint, &newnumComponent,
00206                               &newassoc, &newmathtype, &newdatatype);
00207 
00208       for (ii  = 0; ii < numStepPerVar[jj]; ii++){ //like each time
00209         fc_getVariableDataPtr(newseqvar[ii],&data);
00210         fc_getVariableDataPtr(seqVars[jj][ii],&data2);
00211 
00212         printf("step %d\n", ii);
00213         fflush(NULL);
00214         for (j = 0; j < newnumDataPoint; j++) { //like each node
00215           printf("%d: ", j);
00216           for (k = 0; k < newnumComponent; k++) { //like dimensionality
00217             if (datatype == FC_DT_INT){
00218               printf("(%d ", (((int*)data2)[j*newnumComponent + k]));
00219             } else {
00220               if (datatype == FC_DT_FLOAT){
00221                 printf("(%f ",(((float*)data2)[j*newnumComponent + k]));
00222               }else {
00223                 printf("(%f ",(((double*)data2)[j*newnumComponent + k]));
00224               }
00225             }
00226             if (newdatatype == FC_DT_FLOAT){
00227               printf("%f) ", (((float*)data)[j*newnumComponent + k]));
00228             }else{
00229               printf("%f) ", (((double*)data)[j*newnumComponent + k]));
00230             }
00231           }
00232           printf("\n");
00233           fflush(NULL);
00234         }
00235         data = NULL;
00236         data2 = NULL;
00237       }
00238       fc_deleteSeqVariable(numStepPerVar[jj],newseqvar);
00239       free(newseqvar);
00240     }
00241 
00242     // cleanup
00243     free(numStepPerVar);
00244     free(seqVars);
00245     
00246     // delete mesh
00247     fc_deleteMesh(meshes[i]);
00248     free(mesh_name);
00249   }
00250     
00251   // shut down
00252   fc_deleteDataset(ds);
00253   fc_finalLibrary();
00254   
00255   exit(0);
00256 }
Generated on Mon Oct 27 13:25:50 2008 for FCLib by  1.5.5
